post.content:
Job Title:         Intermediate UI .NET Developer
Job ID:         607
Company:         Kovasys INC.
Position Type:         Permanent
Pay Rate:         $50,000 - $60,000
Date Posted:         Mar-01-10

ShareThis

We are looking for a UI .NET developer that focuses mainly in ASP.NET User Interface design and development.  This individual understands that User Interfaces should be intuitive and interactive. The successful candidate will have extensive JavaScript and CSS experience. In addition, the individual will be well versed in ASP.NET and web application development.Experience - Must have a degree with a major in computer science and 3+ years practical experience, or have 5+ years practical experience- 2+ years Object Oriented Programming experience- Software design/architecture experience, including UI and usability  Required Skills- Strong knowledge of .NET including ASP.NET- Strong knowledge of C#- Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML and XML- Ability to clearly convey concepts and ideas both verbal and written- Strong graphic design skills and knowledge of Photoshop and Fireworks
Location:         Canada-ON-Toronto
Telecommute:         No (Onsite Position)
Contact Name:        Kovasys INC.
Contact Phone:        
Contact Email:        corporate@kovasys.com
URL:        http://www.kovasys.com/jobs.asp?id=607
